mainEntity.name: What services does Active Bridge offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Active Bridge provides Ruby on Rails development, IT staff augmentation, custom web development, mobile app solutions, and cloud solutions.
IT staff augmentation is a service where companies extend their in-house teams by hiring dedicated developers to work remotely or onsite for specific projects.

mainEntity.name: Which industries does Active Bridge specialize in?

acceptedAnswer.text: Active Bridge specializes in solutions for industries such as HealthTech, InsurTech, E-commerce, B2C marketplaces, and travel and logistics.

mainEntity.name: How can I contact Active Bridge?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can contact Active Bridge via email at contact@active-bridge.com or by calling +18888053503.
